classes.name: Android
classes.docstring:
Follows the guidance `from here <https://android.stackexchange.com/a/216132>`_.

Makes use of the `appname <platformdirs.api.PlatformDirsABC.appname>`, `version
<platformdirs.api.PlatformDirsABC.version>`, `ensure_exists <platformdirs.api.PlatformDirsABC.ensure_exists>`.

methods.name: user_data_dir
methods.docstring: :return: data directory tied to the user, e.g. ``/data/user/<userid>/<packagename>/files/<AppName>``

methods.name: site_data_dir
methods.docstring: :return: data directory shared by users, same as `user_data_dir`

methods.name: user_config_dir
methods.docstring: :return: config directory tied to the user, e.g.         ``/data/user/<userid>/<packagename>/shared_prefs/<AppName>``

methods.name: site_config_dir
methods.docstring: :return: config directory shared by the users, same as `user_config_dir`

methods.name: user_cache_dir
methods.docstring: :return: cache directory tied to the user, e.g.,``/data/user/<userid>/<packagename>/cache/<AppName>``

methods.name: site_cache_dir
methods.docstring: :return: cache directory shared by users, same as `user_cache_dir`

methods.name: user_state_dir
methods.docstring: :return: state directory tied to the user, same as `user_data_dir`

methods.name: user_log_dir
methods.docstring:
:return: log directory tied to the user, same as `user_cache_dir` if not opinionated else ``log`` in it,
  e.g. ``/data/user/<userid>/<packagename>/cache/<AppName>/log``

methods.name: user_documents_dir
methods.docstring: :return: documents directory tied to the user e.g. ``/storage/emulated/0/Documents``

methods.name: user_downloads_dir
methods.docstring: :return: downloads directory tied to the user e.g. ``/storage/emulated/0/Downloads``

methods.name: user_pictures_dir
methods.docstring: :return: pictures directory tied to the user e.g. ``/storage/emulated/0/Pictures``

methods.name: user_videos_dir
methods.docstring: :return: videos directory tied to the user e.g. ``/storage/emulated/0/DCIM/Camera``

methods.name: user_music_dir
methods.docstring: :return: music directory tied to the user e.g. ``/storage/emulated/0/Music``

methods.name: user_desktop_dir
methods.docstring: :return: desktop directory tied to the user e.g. ``/storage/emulated/0/Desktop``

methods.name: user_runtime_dir
methods.docstring:
:return: runtime directory tied to the user, same as `user_cache_dir` if not opinionated else ``tmp`` in it,
  e.g. ``/data/user/<userid>/<packagename>/cache/<AppName>/tmp``

methods.name: site_runtime_dir
methods.docstring: :return: runtime directory shared by users, same as `user_runtime_dir`
